title: ADA National Network
description: Comprehensive information about the Americans with Disabilities Act, including your rights, how to file complaints, and resources for businesses.

title: Job Accommodation Network (JAN)
description: Free, expert, and confidential guidance on workplace accommodations and disability employment issues.

title: Assistive Technology Industry Association
description: Resources and information about assistive technology products and services that help people with disabilities.

title: Disability Rights Education & Defense Fund
description: Leading national civil rights law and policy center directed by individuals with disabilities and parents.

title: Centers for Independent Living
description: Community-based, cross-disability, nonresidential private nonprofit agencies that provide services and advocacy.

title: Social Security Disability Benefits
description: Information about Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI) and Supplemental Security Income (SSI) programs.

title: National Center on Disability and Journalism
description: Resources for journalists covering disability issues, including style guides and best practices.

title: Healthcare Access for People with Disabilities
description: Information about healthcare rights, accessible medical facilities, and finding disability-competent providers.
